page.title: 14Durham Constabulary
page.content: { Sergeant Ball}is a{Police Liason {Officer.} He tries to establish a good relationship between civilians and police officers. He works for{Durham {Constabulary.} The people making up his complement are 10-12 officers, 1 sergeant and 1 inspector. The shifts he can work are 10 pm - 6 am, 6 am - 2 pm and 2 pm to 10 pm. Durham Police Force's area consists of{Durham, Darlington, Bishop {Auckland and Chester-le-Street. }The Darlington police force comprises of about 140 people. To join the Durham Constabulary you have to be over 18 and a half, and women have to be 5ft 4in and men have to be over 5ft 8 in. You have to be reasonably intelligient, with good qualifications.{ { Tara Stafford.
